trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementing object must be notified of marshaling, unmarshaling, and disconnection of objects and proxies by the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 指示实现对象必须得到由远程结构发出的有关对象与代理的封送处理、取消封送处理和断开的通知。

trans-unit.source: Every object that is registered with <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices> is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 注册的每个对象<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices>时的对象或代理在当前由远程处理调用<xref:System.AppDomain>封送、 取消封送或断开连接。

trans-unit.source: Note that only objects can be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，仅对象可以断开连接。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown when disconnect is called on a proxy.
trans-unit.target: 将引发异常时断开连接代理服务器上调用。

trans-unit.source: This interface makes a link demand.
trans-unit.target: 此接口使链接要求。

trans-unit.source: A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接调用方发出通过接口的引用调用，而不具有基础结构的权限，将引发安全异常。

trans-unit.source: See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement the methods of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler> interface to receive notifications from the remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法的方法<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler>接口从远程处理基础结构接收通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在服务器上实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a client for the server in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在前面的代码示例中的服务器的客户端上实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示由服务器和客户端的远程对象。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作基础结构代码。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />; Permission Value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: The disconnected object.
trans-unit.target: 已断开连接的对象。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the current instance that an object has been disconnected from its proxy.
trans-unit.target: 通知当前实例某个对象已与其代理断开连接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler>接口。

trans-unit.source: The object that has been marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 已封送的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> that results from marshaling and represents the specified object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" />，它由封送处理产生，并表示指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the current instance that an object has been marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 通知当前实例已封送对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler>接口。

trans-unit.source: The unmarshaled object.
trans-unit.target: 已取消封送的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" /> that represents the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the current instance that an object has been unmarshaled.
trans-unit.target: 通知当前实例已将对象取消封送。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此方法。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.ITrackingHandler>接口。
